solution_line_template: His total score for the {points_per_2pt_shot}-point shots is {points_per_2pt_shot} x {num_2pt_shots} = <<{points_per_2pt_shot}*{num_2pt_shots}={total_2pt_score}>>{total_2pt_score}.
His total score for the {points_per_3pt_shot}-point shots is {points_per_3pt_shot} x {num_3pt_shots} = <<{points_per_3pt_shot}*{num_3pt_shots}={total_3pt_score}>>{total_3pt_score}.
His total score for the first quarter is {total_2pt_score} + {total_3pt_score} = <<{total_2pt_score}+{total_3pt_score}={total_quarter_score}>>{total_quarter_score}.
